snippet.title: Flashback 2 - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Join the resistance in Flashback 2, now available on Xbox Series X|S and on Q1 2024 on Xbox One!

In the heart of a dystopian future, Conrad B. Hart must confront the dreaded Morphs, Mankind's implacable enemies who aim to enslave all civilizations in the solar system. To thwart their plan, you'll have to deploy your skills in this nerve-wracking platformer-shooter, with its striking fluidity and demanding precision.

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/flashback-2/9msw08l3l5xv

SUBSCRIBE TO XBOX: https://xbx.lv/2EEjmaR 

FOLLOW XBOX 
https://twitter.com/xbox 
https://www.facebook.com/xbox 
https://www.instagram.com/xbox/
